data: {"generalSituation":"A strong northeast monsoon will affect the coast of southern China tomorrow, it will be rather cool in the morning over the region. A band of clouds will cover Guangdong in the next couple of days. The monsoon will moderate progressively and temperatures over southern China will rise midweek this week. A fresh easterly airstream is expected to affect the coast of Guangdong in the latter part of this week.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260209","week":"Monday","forecastWind":"East force 5, occasionally force 7 offshore and on high ground.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy and cool.
